# 11 Docs

> Documentation for 11 Docs.

- [Breaking change: Environment.TickCount made consistent with Windows timeout behavior](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/11/environment-tickcount-windows-behavior.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 11 where Environment.TickCount and Environment.TickCount64 on Windows now exclude sleep and hibernation time, consistent with OS wait APIs.
- [Breaking change: MemoryStream maximum capacity updated and exception behavior changed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/core-libraries/11/memorystream-max-capacity.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 11 where MemoryStream enforces a maximum capacity and throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException for invalid capacity values.
